nodes.text: The Toydaria system was a star system located in Hutt Space that contained the planet Toydaria, homeworld of the Toydarian species. During the Clone Wars, the system was at first neutral but sided with the Galactic Republic part way through the war.

The Toydaria system was first mentioned, albeit indirectly, in "Ambush," the first episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on October 3, 2008. The star system later made its first appearance in "Supply Lines," the third episode of the series' third season, which originally aired on September 24, 2010.
